5 #ifndef GB_THREADED_MAP
6 #define GB_THREADED_MAP

28 // Class definitions

31 
33 template<typename K, typename V>
34 class ThreadedMap {
35 public:
36 
37  typedef tsl::robin_map<K, V> MapType;
38 
39  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
42 
44 
45  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
48 
50 
51  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
54 
55  std::shared_mutex& mutex() const { return m_mutex; }
56 
57  V& operator[](const K& key) {
58  // Non-const, so needs a unique lock
59  std::unique_lock lock(m_mutex);
60  return m_map[key];
61  }
62 
63  V& operator[](K&& key) {
64  // Non-const, so needs a unique lock
65  std::unique_lock lock(m_mutex);
66  return m_map[std::forward<K>(key)];
67  }
68 
70 
71  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
74 
75  size_t size() const {
76  std::shared_lock lock(m_mutex);
77  return m_map.size();
78  }
79 
80  size_t erase(const K& key) {
81  std::unique_lock lock(m_mutex);
82  return m_map.erase(key);
83  }
84 
85  typename MapType::const_iterator begin() const {
86  std::shared_lock lock(m_mutex);
87  return m_map.begin();
88  }
89 
90  typename MapType::const_iterator end() const {
91  std::shared_lock lock(m_mutex);
92  return m_map.end();
93  }
94 
96  template<class UnaryPredicate>
97  void forEach(UnaryPredicate pred) const {
98  std::shared_lock lock(m_mutex);
99  for (const std::pair<K, V>& mapPair : m_map) {
100  pred(mapPair);
101  }
102  }
103 
105  template<class UnaryPredicate>
106  void forEach(UnaryPredicate pred) {
107  std::unique_lock lock(m_mutex);
108  for (std::pair<K, V>& mapPair : m_map) {
109  pred(mapPair);
110  }
111  }
112 
114  template<class UnaryPredicate>
115  inline auto any_of(UnaryPredicate pred) const // Const is important
116  {
117  std::shared_lock lock(m_mutex);
118  return ThreadedMap::any_of(m_map.begin(), m_map.end(), pred);
119  }
120 
122  template<class UnaryPredicate>
123  inline auto find_if(UnaryPredicate pred) const // Const is important
124  {
125  std::shared_lock lock(m_mutex);
126  return ThreadedMap::find_if(m_map.begin(), m_map.end(), pred);
127  }
128 
129  bool hasKey(const K& key) const {
130  // find() and end() have const variants which are being used, so read-safe
131  std::shared_lock lock(m_mutex);
132  return Map::HasKey(m_map, key);
133  }
134 
135  const V& at(const K& k) const {
136  // Can call const methods from any number of theads concurrently
137  // Still need lock so that a write doesn't happen while accessing
138  std::shared_lock lock(m_mutex);
139  return m_map.at(k);
140  }
141 
143  template<typename ...Vals>
144  auto emplace(const K& key, Vals && ... values) {
145  std::unique_lock lock(m_mutex);
146  return Map::Emplace(m_map, key, std::forward<Vals>(values)...);
147  }
148 
150 
151 protected:
152 
153  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
156 
158  template< class InputIt, class UnaryPredicate >
159  inline static constexpr bool any_of(InputIt first, InputIt last, UnaryPredicate p)
160  {
161  return ThreadedMap::find_if(first, last, p) != last;
162  }
163 
165  template<class InputIterator, class UnaryPredicate>
166  inline static InputIterator find_if(InputIterator first, InputIterator last, UnaryPredicate pred)
167  {
168  while (first != last) {
169  if (pred(*first)) return first;
170  ++first;
171  }
172  return last;
173  }
174 
176 
177 
178  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
181 
183  mutable std::shared_mutex m_mutex;
184 
186  tsl::robin_map<K, V> m_map;
187 
189 };
190 
191 
193 } // End namespaces
194 
195 #endif
